content.html: The different ways I work as a software engineer with ADHD: - Do nothing all day. - Work sporadically throughout the day with random spurts of energy. - Do all the work for the week in one hour, usually around 5pm.
content.value:
The different ways I work as a software engineer with ADHD: 

- Do nothing all day. 
- Work sporadically throughout the day with random spurts of energy.
- Do all the work for the week in one hour, usually around 5pm.
